member.name: DEFAULTSAVEFOLDERTYPE.DSFT_DETECT
member.summary: The current user determines the save folder. If the current user is the library's owner, use the private save location (). If the current user is not the library's owner, use the public save location ().

member.name: DEFAULTSAVEFOLDERTYPE.DSFT_PRIVATE
member.summary: The library's private save location, which can only be accessed by the library's owner.

member.name: DEFAULTSAVEFOLDERTYPE.DSFT_PUBLIC
member.summary: The library's public save location, which can be accessed by all users.
